alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 25 at 6:27AM CDT until April 26 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Denton Creek Near Justin affecting Denton County. For the Denton Creek...including Justin...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Denton Creek Near Justin. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, minor out of bank flooding will occur to farm and ranch lands near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 10.5 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
